Hello World!

My name is John Louie, and you have just found my personal website! Welcome! This website is meant to be a combination of many things. While its most basic purpose is to serve as a portal to important information about me, I hope that this website helps one to not only see and learn what I am capable of, but also gain a better understanding of who I am.

Education

I'll keep this portion short: I am currently a junior studying Computer Science at Stanford University. You can see my résumé here. I am fascinated by the intersection between medicine/healthcare and technology and strongly believe that it is one of the few great frontiers that technology has yet to truly revolutionize. Owing to my interest in medicine and healthcare, I have taken numerous classes in Human Biology in addiiton to my computer science classes. I am also very interested in education--teaching, tutoring, helping, how to improve it, etc.--and I am an active section leader for Stanford Univeristy's introductory computer sciences courses (CS106A/CS106B/CS106X).

Interests

I like to think that I'm fascinated by a lot of things. Rather than ramble on in paragraph form, I'll simply make a list below:
